verbs.description: [V: snap] [ARG1: stock] falls as the company chief strategy officer quits to pursue other opportunities the former credit suisse banker imran khan joined snapchat in 2015 as part of efforts to take the company public chief strategy officer evan spiegel us securities and exchange commission imran khan snap inc snap stock
